meaningMnemonic: The result (甲斐) of being your own <kanji>gender</kanji> shows your <vocabulary>resourcefulness</vocabulary>. Depending on your gender, certain things are harder than others, so your resourcefulness and <vocabulary>competence</vocabulary> will help you to overcome those hurdles.
readingMnemonic: This word combines the word 甲斐 (that you already learned) with the on'yomi reading for 性. You know them both, just put them together!
